item.title: Tailwindcss getting started
item.description: Initialization the project 1mkdir tailwind 2cd tailwind 3pnpm create vite@latest my-project -- --template vue 4pnpm install -D tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer 5# this will create a `tailwind.config.js` `postcss.config.js` 6pnpm tailwindcss init -p 7pnpm run dev config the tailwind css project add the package to src/style.css 1@tailwind base; 2@tailwind components; 3@tailwind utilities; config the postcss.config.js 1export default { 2 plugins: { 3 tailwindcss: {}, 4 autoprefixer: {}, 5 }, 6} config the tailwind.
